chapters.title: Chapter 16:  The Subject of Negotiations
chapters.info: Akarrin, p. 404 (486)—Slim Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah. She was convinced that Aviendha would be in novice white before long. She led the party of sisters that Traveled to the area near Shadar Logoth where Rand cleansed saidin. She is good at reading residues.
